SEARCH
Package executor.service.service.driver

Class WebDriverInitializerImpl

java.lang.Object
executor.service.service.driver.WebDriverInitializerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebDriverInitializer
@Component public class WebDriverInitializerImpl extends Object implements WebDriverInitializer
Implementation of WebDriverInitializer for creating and configuring WebDriver instances.

The WebDriverInitializerImpl class is a Spring-managed component responsible for creating and configuring instances of WebDriver. It implements the WebDriverInitializer interface, providing the necessary logic for initializing WebDriver instances based on the specified configuration, including proxy settings.

The proxy extension URL is configured using the proxy.extension.url property, allowing customization of the proxy settings. The instance is constructed with a WebDriverConfig bean, providing additional configuration options for WebDriver.

Implementations of this class are expected to use the provided configurations and settings to create fully configured and ready-to-use instances of WebDriver. Any necessary setup steps or configurations for interacting with web browsers, including proxy settings, should be handled within the implementation.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver create(ProxyConfigHolder proxyConfigHolder)
      Creates and initializes a Chrome WebDriver instance based on the provided proxy configuration.

      This method configures and creates a Chrome WebDriver instance using the WebDriverManager for managing ChromeDriver binaries. It sets up ChromeDriver using WebDriverManager.chromedriver().setup(). Additionally, it applies Chrome options, including proxy settings if a ProxyConfigHolder is provided.

      The proxyConfigHolder parameter allows customization of the proxy configuration for the WebDriver. If a non-null proxy configuration is provided, this method configures the Chrome options and the WebDriver instance with the specified proxy settings.

      If proxy authentication is required, the method further configures the WebDriver instance with proxy authentication details. Timeout configurations are also applied to the WebDriver instance to ensure appropriate waiting times during interactions.

      Specified by:
      create in interface WebDriverInitializer
      Parameters:
      proxyConfigHolder - The holder for proxy configuration, allowing additional customization.
      Returns:
      A configured and initialized instance of Chrome WebDriver.
      See Also:
      • WebDriverManager
      • ChromeOptions
      • ProxyConfigHolder
      • ChromeDriver
